name: Salomon Tech Lite Watershoes - Men's
description:
One shoe to take you from trail to water to city. The Tech Lite's seamless mesh is incredibly lightweight and doesn't hold moisture, so your feet dry out after lake dips. It is made of highly-sustainable natural and recycled materials, so you feel good about your choices while wandering around town and in the outdoors.Quick-drying mesh upper is made from over 60% recycled plastic bottles.Liner is made from 40% coffee beans.Heel collapses to be worn as a slip-on.EnergyCell EVA midsole and sockliner cushions underfoot.Durable Contagrip® MD rubber sole.

        Sustainability
